casebody.data:
McLAUGHLIN, et al.
v.
BAILEY, et al. No. 163A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Oct. 7, 2015. Harvey L. Kennedy, Winston-Salem, for McLaughlin, Ivan, et al. Harold L. Kennedy, III, Winston-Salem, for McLaughlin, Ivan, et al. Sean F. Perrin, Charlotte, for Bailey, Daniel, et al. William G. Simpson, Jr., Chapel Hill, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. Jon Ward, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of October 2015 by N.C. Advocates for Justice for Leave to File Amended Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of October 2015."
Ervin, J. recused.
